name: J0urney Art
text: Pizza was okay, def. Not the freshest slice I've had. Staff is friendly, atmosphere has a home feel too it. Definitely stop by here and grab some buffet pizza if you need something cheap, quick, and easy!

name: Computer Lady Web Designs
text: Awesome customer service from a young man from Baton rouge who works there. Pizza was great looking and tasted great. It's been a while since we dined in at a Pizza Hut, but this experience was very nice!

name: rebecca matherly
text: Great pizza and excellent customer service. Lucas is the best.

name: Lynn Baker
text: Everything was perfect. First time trying their bone in chicken wings. Hotter the better. I am a new fan of them.

name: Dr. Deb
text: The lunch buffet is just ok.  Not a lot of pizza choices.  Most of pizza on buffet was cold.  I would not recommend the buffet unless you want the dessert.  The dessert was soooo good.

text: It's like stepping back to 1975. Place is immaculate and the food is wonderful. In fact I had the best mozzarella sticks in a long time here at this Pizza hut restaurant.

name: James Berry
text: The Manager and staff has improved greatly.   They offer new deals kids night out with movies games and much more on Tuesdays buffet.   Wonderful friendly and very family oriented

name: Debbie Hoke
text: Good price,  replinished quickly,  table serviced regularly,  reasonable variety,  clean,  quick, both deep dish and thin crust,  some pasta and one desert,  breadsticks and sauce,  refillable and to go drink option, military discount,  wheelchair accessible.  Buffet starts at 11, M-F.

text: This location was very low key at the time my daughter and I went in. It is a rather old building and could desperately use a facelift, however with so many pizza places now going to extremely small restaurants and/or carry out or delivery only, I was okay with sitting down and eating at this relic of a restaurant.

text: We eat here for the Tuesday buffet, they seem to have trouble keeping good management. Kitchen staff are willing to show their frustrations openly if you request something besides what they have out on the buffet...however they don't supply a good variety for it.

name: D W
text: I order from this location fairly often. They are frequently more than 20 minutes late on delivery. They get my order right about one in every ten times. There is almost always something made wrong or missing. I only continue to order from them because Dominos in Silsbee is just as bad.
